languages.text: "Паника и ересь. Люди готовы задавить друг друга на пути к шаттлам, становясь легкой мишенью для врага".
"Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."
languages.original_text: "Паника и ересь. Люди готовы задавить друг друга на пути к шаттлам, становясь легкой мишенью для врага".

traits.locale_text: "Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

"Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

languages.text: "Panik und Ketzerei. Die Leute schlagen sich gegenseitig die Schädel ein, um die Shuttles zu erreichen. Das macht sie für den Feind zu leichten Zielen."
languages.original_text: "Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Panik und Ketzerei. Die Leute schlagen sich gegenseitig die Schädel ein, um die Shuttles zu erreichen. Das macht sie für den Feind zu leichten Zielen."

languages.text: « Il est submergé par la panique et l'hérésie. Les gens sont prêts à se piétiner pour atteindre les navettes, ce qui en fait des cibles faciles pour l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

traits.locale_text: « Il est submergé par la panique et l'hérésie. Les gens sont prêts à se piétiner pour atteindre les navettes, ce qui en fait des cibles faciles pour l'ennemi. »

languages.text: «Pánico y herejía. La gente está dispuesta a despedazarse mutuamente con tal de subir a las lanzaderas, y eso los convierte en presa fácil para el enemigo».
languages.original_text: "Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

traits.locale_text: «Pánico y herejía. La gente está dispuesta a despedazarse mutuamente con tal de subir a las lanzaderas, y eso los convierte en presa fácil para el enemigo».

languages.text: “恐慌，异端恶行。所有人都挤在一起，打算抢先一步钻进穿梭机。他们在敌人面前不堪一击。”
languages.original_text: "Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

traits.locale_text: “恐慌，异端恶行。所有人都挤在一起，打算抢先一步钻进穿梭机。他们在敌人面前不堪一击。”

languages.text: 「混乱と異端が渦巻いています。人々はシャトルに殺到して、互いを押し潰そうとしています。そのせいで、敵にとっては格好の標的になっているのです」
languages.original_text: "Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

traits.locale_text: 「混乱と異端が渦巻いています。人々はシャトルに殺到して、互いを押し潰そうとしています。そのせいで、敵にとっては格好の標的になっているのです」

languages.text: "Panik ve kâfirlik kol geziyor. İnsanlar mekiklere ulaşmak için birbirlerini ezip geçmeye dünden razı. Bu yüzden de hepsi düşmanın gözünde kolay av durumunda."
languages.original_text: "Panic and heresy. The people are ready to crush each other to reach the shuttles, which makes them easy targets for the enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Panik ve kâfirlik kol geziyor. İnsanlar mekiklere ulaşmak için birbirlerini ezip geçmeye dünden razı. Bu yüzden de hepsi düşmanın gözünde kolay av durumunda."
